snippet: The wildfire in Placerville, east of Sacramento, burned through 71,000 acres and threatened over 2,000 homes, and was only 5 percent contained.
abstract: Wildfire in Placerville, Calif, triples in size to 71,000 acres and forces evacuation of 2,000 people; forest fire is only 5 percent contained; Wayne Huntsman is arrested and charged with arson.

byline.original: By ROBERT B. GUNNISON and ADAM NAGOURNEY
byline.contributor: Robert B. Gunnison reported from Placerville and Adam Nagourney from Los Angeles. Timothy Williams contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The wildfire in Placerville, east of Sacramento, burned through 71,000 acres and threatened over 2,000 homes, and was only 5 percent contained.

headline.main: Man Is Arrested as Northern California Wildfire Rages, Threatening Thousands of Homes
headline.print_headline: A Voracious Inferno Spreads Overnight in Water-Starved California
